about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • "Friedrich "WD-40k" Diesel" hero unlock;
  • "Jack of All Trades" outfit;
  • "Big Wrench" weapon;
  • 700 Crowns.

Friedrich Diesel is the jack-of-all-trades. His passion for engineering and everything connected with it has been fanatical since childhood, preferring machinery construction to communicating with people. Diesel is gifted with the “Weird Science” ability and can create different mechanisms: a buggy, a helicopter, a spy camera, a protective wall.

Ability: "Weird Science"
You create different mechanisms. No laws of physics can stop the genius of engineering on its way to victory.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.
detailed_description:
This pack includes:

  • "Friedrich "WD-40k" Diesel" hero unlock;
  • "Jack of All Trades" outfit;
  • "Big Wrench" weapon;
  • 700 Crowns.

Friedrich Diesel is the jack-of-all-trades. His passion for engineering and everything connected with it has been fanatical since childhood, preferring machinery construction to communicating with people. Diesel is gifted with the “Weird Science” ability and can create different mechanisms: a buggy, a helicopter, a spy camera, a protective wall.

Ability: "Weird Science"
You create different mechanisms. No laws of physics can stop the genius of engineering on its way to victory.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1060 or better, AMD Radeon RX480 or better
